description.en: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Expande o limite de itens que o personagem pode carregar em 24. (Dura 24 horas após ser ativado, mesmo se não estiver conectado).
description.cns: 扩展24格背包道具栏，可同时叠加使用2个。(持续24小时，离线计时)
description.de: Erhöht die Anzahl der Gegenstände die du tragen kannst um 24. Du kannst nur 2 zur gleichen Zeit benutzen. Hält 24 Stunden.
description.fi: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: Débloque 24 emplacements d'inventaire pendant 24 heures. Vous pouvez utiliser 2 sacs supplémentaires en même temps.
description.id: Memperluas batas pembawa item sebesar 24 item untuk karakter. Anda hanya dapat menggunakan 2 secara bersamaan. (Berlangsung 24 jam sejak aktivasi, bahkan jika log off)
description.it: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: キャラクターのインベントリアイテム所持数の上限を24個拡張します。同時に使用できるのは2個までです。(ログアウト状態でもカウントされ、24時間持続します）
description.kr: 캐릭터에 대한 아이템 휴대 제한을 24개까지 확장합니다. 한 번에 2개만 사용할 수 있습니다. (로그오프된 경우에도 작동 후 24시간 지속됩니다)
description.nl: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.pl: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.ru: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.sp: Aumenta el espacio disponible en 24 objetos de tu Mochila. Solo puedes usar 2 a la vez. Dura 24 horas, incluso si estás desconectado. (Presiona B para abrir tu Mochila)
description.sw: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. (Lasts 24 hours from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: ขยายขีดจำกัดการบรรทุกไอเท็ม 24 รายการสำหรับตัวละคร คุณสามารถใช้ได้เพียง 2 อันในเวลาเดียวกัน (ใช้งานได้ 24 ชั่วโมง แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 角色可以多攜帶24格物品，最多可以同時使用兩個，持續1天(登出仍然計算時間)
description.vi: Mở rộng giới hạn mang vật phẩm lên 24 vật phẩm cho các nhân vật. Bạn chỉ có thể sử dụng 2 cùng một lúc. (Kéo dài 24 giờ kể từ khi kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
